wiki.summary: "ON" is a song by BTS. It was released on February 21, 2020. It serves as the title track and appears as the eleventh track for their fourth studio album Map of the Soul: 7. A remixed version featuring Australian singer Sia was released the same day in the digital version of their fourth studio album. This song also has a Japanese version featured in their fourth Japanese studio album Map of the Soul: 7 ~The Journey~. —Awards and nominations— Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: "ON" is a song by BTS. It was released on February 21, 2020. It serves as the title track and appears as the eleventh track for their fourth studio album Map of the Soul: 7. A remixed version featuring Australian singer Sia was released the same day in the digital version of their fourth studio album. This song also has a Japanese version featured in their fourth Japanese studio album Map of the Soul: 7 ~The Journey~. —Awards and nominations— —Music program awards— Song Program Date "ON" Music Bank (KBS) February 28, 2020 March 6, 2020 March 13, 2020 March 20, 2020 Show!
